verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will have a part with thee,
Precious Lord, wash over me,
wash away all the Stain,
till in my heart Your love reigns.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wash over me, wash over me, wash over me, wash over me,
Water of life, Make me clean, in Your sight
Remove the stain of the past,
clean and fresh, I'll be at last,
wash over me; wash over me
